item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, May 11, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. India and Pakistan’s fragile ceasefire holds after alleged breaches
2. China’s J-10 ‘Dragon’ shows teeth in India-Pakistan combat debut
3. How a little-known French literary critic became a bellwether for the US right
4. [Opinion] Why can’t more financial heavyweights write letters like Warren Buffett?
5. [Opinion] Why travel didn’t bring the world together
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, May 11, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
